name: SOS (itch) (ORT-SOS)
description:
After an emergency landing in a desert island, the four passengers engage in a fight for survival. The first one to gather the five required items and make their way to the boat will be able to escape. Each of the passengers will have to use the power-ups and environment to their advantage in order to be out of the island by the time the volcano erupts.

Feedback (English): https://forms.gle/gPDa2sqC2BgkxnVR8

Feedback (Spanish): https://forms.gle/WgWjSadUyezeVRZN9
